title: Are Universal Potentials Ready for Alkali-Ion Battery Kinetics?
summary: Accelerating alkali-ion battery discovery requires accurate modeling of atomic-scale kinetics, yet the reliability of universal machine learning interatomic potentials (uMLIPs) in capturing these high-energy landscapes remains uncertain. Here, we systematically benchmark state-of-the-art uMLIPs, including M3GNet, CHGNet, MACE, SevenNet, GRACE, and Orb, against DFT baselines for cathodes and solid electrolytes. We find that the Orb-v3 family excels in static migration barrier predictions (MAE $\approx$ 75--111 meV), driven primarily by architectural refinements. Conversely, for dynamic transport, the GRACE model trained on the OMat24 dataset demonstrates superior fidelity in reproducing ion diffusivities and structural correlations. Our results reveal that while architectural sophistication (e.g., equivariance) is beneficial, the inclusion of high-temperature, non-equilibrium training data is the dominant driver of kinetic accuracy. These findings establish that modern uMLIPs are sufficiently robust to serve as zero-shot surrogates for high-throughput kinetic screening of next-generation energy storage materials.

AI.tldr: 本文系统评估了多种通用机器学习原子间势能模型在碱离子电池材料动力学预测中的性能，发现Orb-v3在静态迁移势垒预测上表现最佳，而GRACE模型在动态输运性质预测上最准确，表明现代uMLIPs可作为高通量动力学筛选的可靠零样本替代工具。
AI.motivation: 加速碱离子电池材料发现需要精确的原子尺度动力学建模，但通用机器学习原子间势能模型在高能态动力学景观预测中的可靠性仍不确定，因此需要系统评估现有先进模型的实际性能。
AI.method: 系统性地对M3GNet、CHGNet、MACE、SevenNet、GRACE和Orb等先进uMLIPs进行基准测试，与DFT基准数据对比，评估它们在阴极和固态电解质材料静态迁移势垒预测和动态输运性质预测方面的性能。
AI.result: Orb-v3系列在静态迁移势垒预测中表现最佳（MAE约75-111 meV），主要得益于架构优化；而GRACE模型在动态输运性质预测中表现最优，能准确再现离子扩散系数和结构相关性。研究发现，虽然架构复杂性（如等变性）有益，但包含高温非平衡训练数据是动力学准确性的主要驱动因素。
AI.conclusion: 现代通用机器学习原子间势能模型已足够稳健，可作为高通量动力学筛选下一代储能材料的零样本替代工具，为加速电池材料发现提供了可靠的计算工具。

title: Enhancement of anomalous Hall effect in Si/Fe multilayers
summary: Anomalous Hall effect studies were performed at 300 K on Si/Fe multilayers prepared by dc magnetron sputtering. About 60 times enhancement in the saturation Hall resistance and 80 times enhancement in anomalous Hall coefficient are obtained in [Si(50 angstrom)/Fe(tFe)]_20 multilayers when decreasing the Fe layer thickness from 100 Angstrom to 20 Angstrom. The largest anomalous Hall coefficient (Rs) of 1.4 x 10^-7 Ohm m/T was found for t_Fe=20 Angstrom, which is about three orders of magnitude larger than that of pure Fe and Fe/Cr, Al/Fe, Cu/Fe, SiO2/FePt/SiO2 multilayers. The ordinary Hall coefficient R_0 was about two orders of magnitude larger than that of pure Fe. The R_s was found to vary with the longitudinal electronic resistivity, Rho as R_s proportional to (Rho)^2.2, indicating the role of interfaces for the enhancement of the anomalous Hall effect in the multilayers. An increase of Hall sensitivity from 9 mOhm/T to 1.2 Ohm/T is observed on decreasing tFe from 100 Angstrom to 10 Angstrom. The high Hall sensitivity obtained is about three orders of magnitude larger than that of Al/Fe and Cu/Fe multilayers, showing it as an emerging candidate for Hall element for potential applications.

AI.tldr: Si/Fe多层膜在300K下表现出异常霍尔效应的显著增强，当Fe层厚度从100Å减小到20Å时，饱和霍尔电阻增强约60倍，异常霍尔系数增强约80倍，最高灵敏度比纯Fe和其他多层膜高三个数量级。
AI.motivation: 研究Si/Fe多层膜中的异常霍尔效应，探索通过界面工程增强霍尔效应的方法，为开发高性能霍尔传感器寻找新材料体系。
AI.method: 采用直流磁控溅射制备[Si(50Å)/Fe(tFe)]_20多层膜，在300K下测量异常霍尔效应，通过改变Fe层厚度（10-100Å）研究界面效应的影响。
AI.result: 当Fe层厚度从100Å减小到20Å时，饱和霍尔电阻增强60倍，异常霍尔系数增强80倍；tFe=20Å时异常霍尔系数达1.4×10^-7 Ω·m/T，比纯Fe高三个数量级；霍尔灵敏度从9 mΩ/T提高到1.2 Ω/T。
AI.conclusion: Si/Fe多层膜通过界面效应显著增强了异常霍尔效应，霍尔灵敏度比传统多层膜高三个数量级，是霍尔传感器应用的潜在候选材料。

title: Data-driven Prediction of Ionic Conductivity in Solid-State Electrolytes with Machine Learning and Large Language Models
summary: Solid-state electrolytes (SSEs) are attractive for next-generation lithium-ion batteries due to improved safety and stability but their low room-temperature ionic conductivity hinders practical application. Experimental synthesis and testing of new SSEs remain time-consuming and resource intensive. Machine learning (ML) offers an accelerated route for SSE discovery; however, composition-only models neglect structural factors important for ion transport while graph neural networks (GNNs) are challenged by the scarcity of structure-labeled conductivity data and the prevalence of crystallographic disorder in CIFs. Here, we train two complementary predictors on the same room-temperature, structure-labeled dataset (n = 499). A gradient-boosted tree regressor (GBR) combining stoichiometric and geometric descriptors achieves best performance (MAE = 0.543 in log(S cm-1)), and Shapley Additive exPlanations (SHAP) identifies probe-occupiable volume (POAV) and lattice parameters as key correlations for conductivity. In parallel, we fine-tune large language models (LLMs) using compact text prompts derived from CIF metadata (formula with optional symmetry and disorder tags), avoiding direct use of raw atomic coordinates. Notably, Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct achieves high accuracy (MAE = 0.657 in log(S cm-1)) using formula and symmetry information, eliminating the need for numerical feature extraction from CIF files. Together, these results show that global geometric descriptors improve tree-based predictions and enable interpretable structure-property analysis, while LLMs provide a competitive low-preprocessing alternative for rapid SSE screening.

AI.tldr: 该研究开发了两种机器学习方法来预测固态电解质（SSE）的离子电导率：基于几何描述符的梯度提升树回归器和基于CIF元数据的LLM微调方法，两者都取得了良好性能。
AI.motivation: 固态电解质因安全性和稳定性优势而备受关注，但其室温离子电导率低限制了实际应用。传统实验方法耗时耗力，现有机器学习方法要么忽略结构因素，要么受限于结构标记数据的稀缺性和晶体学无序问题。
AI.method: 使用同一数据集（n=499）训练两种互补的预测器：1）结合化学计量和几何描述符的梯度提升树回归器（GBR）；2）基于CIF元数据（化学式加可选对称性和无序标签）微调大语言模型（Llama-3.1-8B-Instruct），避免直接使用原始原子坐标。
AI.result: GBR方法获得最佳性能（MAE=0.543 log(S cm-1)），SHAP分析显示探针可占据体积（POAV）和晶格参数是关键相关性因素。LLM方法也取得高精度（MAE=0.657 log(S cm-1)），仅使用化学式和对称性信息即可实现。
AI.conclusion: 全局几何描述符能提升基于树的预测性能并支持可解释的结构-性能分析，而LLM为快速SSE筛选提供了竞争性的低预处理替代方案，两种方法互补推进固态电解质发现。

title: Magnetization and anomalous Hall effect in SiO2/Fe/SiO2 trilayers
summary: SiO2/Fe/SiO2 sandwich structure films fabricated by sputtering were studied by varying the Fe layer thickness (t_Fe). The structural and microstructural studies on the samples showed that the Fe layer has grown in nanocrystalline form with (110) texture and that the two SiO2 layers are amorphous. Magnetic measurements performed with the applied field in in-plane and perpendicular direction to the film plane confirmed that the samples are soft ferromagnetic having strong in-plane magnetic anisotropy. The temperature dependence of magnetization shows complex behavior with the coexistence of both ferromagnetic and superparamagnetic properties. The transport properties of the samples as studied through Hall effect measurements show anomalous Hall effect (AHE). An enhancement of about 14 times in the saturation anomalous Hall resistance (R_Ahs) was observed upon reducing the t_Fe from 300 to 50 Angstrom. The maximum value of R_Ahs = 2.3 Ohm observed for tFe = 50 Angstrom sample is about 4 orders of magnitude larger than that reported for bulk Fe. When compared with the single Fe film, a maximum increase of about 56% in the R_Ahs was observed in sandwiched Fe (50 Angstrom) film. Scaling law suggests that the R_s follows the longitudinal resistivity (Rho) as, R_s proportional to (Rho)^1.9, suggesting side jump as the dominant mechanism of the AHE. A maximum enhancement of about 156% in the sensitivity S was observed.

AI.tldr: SiO2/Fe/SiO2三明治结构薄膜中，通过减小Fe层厚度（50Å）实现了反常霍尔电阻增强14倍，比体相Fe高4个数量级，侧跳机制主导反常霍尔效应。
AI.motivation: 研究SiO2/Fe/SiO2三明治结构中Fe层厚度对磁性和输运性质的影响，特别是反常霍尔效应的增强机制。
AI.method: 采用溅射法制备不同Fe层厚度（50-300Å）的SiO2/Fe/SiO2三明治结构薄膜，通过结构表征、磁性测量（面内/垂直方向）和霍尔效应测量分析其性质。
AI.result: Fe层呈纳米晶(110)织构，SiO2层为非晶；样品具有软铁磁性和强面内磁各向异性；磁化温度依赖显示铁磁和超顺磁共存；Fe层厚度从300Å减至50Å时，饱和反常霍尔电阻增强14倍，比体相Fe高4个数量级；与单层Fe膜相比，三明治结构反常霍尔电阻增加56%；标度律表明侧跳机制主导反常霍尔效应；灵敏度最大增强156%。
AI.conclusion: SiO2/Fe/SiO2三明治结构中Fe层厚度减小至50Å时，反常霍尔效应显著增强，侧跳机制起主导作用，为高性能霍尔传感器设计提供了重要参考。

title: Widefield NV Magnetic Field Reconstruction for Probing the Meissner Effect and Critical Current Density under Pressure
summary: The spatial distribution of a magnetic field can be determined with micrometer resolution using widefield nitrogen vacancy (NV) center magnetic imaging. Nevertheless, reconstructing the magnetic field from the raw data can be challenging due to the degeneracy of the four possible NV axes and the tremendous amount of data. While a qualitative approach is sufficient for most analyses, a quantitative analysis offers deeper insight into the physical system. Here, we apply NV widefield magnetic imaging to a HgBa$_{2}$Ca$_{2}$Cu$_{3}$O$_{8+δ}$ (Hg-1223) superconducting microcrystal at a pressure of 4 GPa. We fit the results with solutions from the Hamiltonian describing the NV center ground state and take into account the relative intensities of the resonances to determine the local magnetic field magnitude and angle. Thus, we reconstruct the temperature-dependent expulsion of the magnetic field due to the Meissner effect around the superconductor. By comparing the resulting parameters to Brandt's model, which describes the magnetic behavior of a type-II superconductor, we extract the critical current density $j_c$. Overall, this work showcases the first widefield quantitative reconstruction of the Meissner effect under pressure and an optical method to study critical current density. Thus, it provides new insights into the application of NV magnetometry to superconductivity research at high pressures.

AI.tldr: 该研究首次在高压下实现了宽场NV磁成像对迈斯纳效应的定量重构，并开发了光学方法研究超导体的临界电流密度。
AI.motivation: 虽然宽场NV中心磁成像能以微米分辨率测量磁场分布，但从原始数据重构磁场存在挑战：四个可能的NV轴简并性和海量数据处理困难。定性分析通常足够，但定量分析能提供更深入的物理系统洞察。
AI.method: 对4 GPa压力下的Hg-1223超导微晶进行NV宽场磁成像，通过拟合描述NV中心基态的哈密顿量解，并考虑共振相对强度，确定局部磁场大小和角度，重构温度依赖的迈斯纳效应磁场排斥。
AI.result: 成功重构了超导体周围因迈斯纳效应产生的温度依赖磁场排斥，通过将结果参数与描述II型超导体磁行为的Brandt模型比较，提取了临界电流密度jc。
AI.conclusion: 该工作首次展示了高压下迈斯纳效应的宽场定量重构，并提供了研究临界电流密度的光学方法，为高压超导研究中NV磁力计的应用提供了新见解。

title: In search of diabolical critical points
summary: A phase transition is an example of a ``topological defect'' in the space of parameters of a quantum or classical many-body systems. In this paper, we consider phase diagram topological defects of higher codimension. These have the property that equilibrium states undergo some kind of non-trivial winding as one moves around the defect. We show that such topological defects exist even in classical statistical mechanical systems, and describe their general structure in this context. We then introduce the term ``diabolical critical point'' (DCP), which is a higher-codimension analog of a continuous phase transition, with the proximate phases of matter replaced by the non-trivial winding of the proximate equilibrium states. We propose conditions under which a system can have a stable DCP. We also discuss some examples of stable DCPs in (1+1)-dimensional quantum systems.

AI.tldr: 论文提出"恶魔临界点"概念，作为连续相变的高余维类比，研究相图中拓扑缺陷的更高余维结构
AI.motivation: 探索相图中更高余维的拓扑缺陷，这些缺陷使得平衡态在缺陷周围发生非平凡缠绕，扩展对相变拓扑结构的理解
AI.method: 在经典统计力学系统中分析拓扑缺陷的一般结构，提出"恶魔临界点"作为连续相变的高余维类比，并建立其稳定性条件
AI.result: 证明了即使在经典统计力学系统中也存在此类拓扑缺陷，提出了DCP的稳定性条件，并讨论了(1+1)维量子系统中的稳定DCP实例
AI.conclusion: 恶魔临界点作为连续相变的高余维推广，为理解相图中的拓扑结构提供了新视角，在经典和量子系统中都存在稳定实例

title: Lévy walkers inside spherical shells with absorbing boundaries: Towards settling the optimal Lévy walk strategy for random searches
summary: The Lévy flight foraging hypothesis states that organisms must have evolved adaptations to exploit Lévy walk search strategies. Indeed, it is widely accepted that inverse square Lévy walks optimize the search efficiency in foraging with unrestricted revisits (also known as non-destructive foraging). However, a mathematically rigorous demonstration of this for dimensions $D \geq 2$ is still lacking. Here we study the very closely related problem of a Lévy walker inside annuli or spherical shells with absorbing boundaries. In the limit that corresponds to the foraging with unrestricted revisits, we show that inverse square Lévy walks optimize the search. This constitutes the strongest formal result to date supporting the optimality of inverse square Lévy walks search strategies.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了在维度D≥2时，逆平方Lévy游走确实优化了搜索效率，为Lévy飞行觅食假说提供了迄今最严格的数学支持。
AI.motivation: Lévy飞行觅食假说认为生物进化出了利用Lévy游走搜索策略的适应机制。虽然广泛认为逆平方Lévy游走在无限制重访（非破坏性觅食）中优化搜索效率，但缺乏D≥2维度的严格数学证明。
AI.method: 研究Lévy游走者在环形或球壳区域（具有吸收边界）的问题。在对应无限制重访觅食的极限情况下，分析逆平方Lévy游走的搜索优化特性。
AI.result: 证明在对应无限制重访觅食的极限情况下，逆平方Lévy游走确实优化了搜索效率。
AI.conclusion: 这构成了迄今为止支持逆平方Lévy游走搜索策略最优性的最强形式结果，为Lévy飞行觅食假说提供了坚实的数学基础。

title: Lambert W Function Framework for Graphene Nanoribbon Quantum Sensing: Theory, Verification, and Multi-Modal Applications
summary: We establish a rigorous mathematical framework connecting graphene nanoribbon quantum sensing to the Lambert W function through the finite square well (FSW) analogy. The Lambert W function, defined as the inverse of $f(W) = We^W$, provides exact analytical solutions to transcendental equations governing quantum confinement. We demonstrate that operating near the branch point at $z = -1/e$ yields sensitivity enhancement factors scaling as $η_{\text{enh}} \propto (z - z_c)^{-1/2}$, achieving 35-fold enhancement at $δ= 0.001$. Comprehensive numerical verification confirms: (i) all seven bound states for strength parameter $R = 10$ satisfying the constraint $u^2 + v^2 = R^2$; (ii) exact agreement between theoretical band gap formula $E_g = 2π\hbar v_F/(3L)$ and empirical relation $E_g = 1.38/L$ eV$\cdot$nm; (iii) universal sensitivity scaling across biomedical (SARS-CoV-2, inflammatory markers, cancer biomarkers), environmental (CO$_2$, CH$_4$, NO$_2$, N$_2$O, H$_2$O), and physical (strain, magnetic field, temperature) sensing modalities. This unified framework provides design principles for next-generation graphene quantum sensors with analytically predictable performance.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了石墨烯纳米带量子传感与Lambert W函数的数学框架，通过有限方势阱类比，利用Lambert W函数解析求解量子约束方程，在分支点附近实现35倍灵敏度增强，并验证了该框架在生物医学、环境和物理传感中的普适性。
AI.motivation: 建立石墨烯纳米带量子传感的严格数学框架，将Lambert W函数与有限方势阱类比相结合，为下一代石墨烯量子传感器提供可解析预测性能的设计原则。
AI.method: 利用Lambert W函数（定义为f(W)=We^W的逆函数）提供量子约束超越方程的精确解析解，通过有限方势阱类比，在分支点z=-1/e附近操作以获得灵敏度增强，并进行全面的数值验证。
AI.result: 在δ=0.001时实现35倍灵敏度增强；验证了所有七个束缚态满足约束条件；理论带隙公式与经验关系精确一致；证明了该灵敏度缩放规律在生物医学、环境和物理传感模态中的普适性。
AI.conclusion: 该统一框架为下一代石墨烯量子传感器提供了具有可解析预测性能的设计原则，建立了石墨烯纳米带量子传感与Lambert W函数之间的严格数学联系。

title: OmniMol: Transferring Particle Physics Knowledge to Molecular Dynamics with Point-Edge Transformers
summary: We present OmniMol, a state-of-the-art transformer-based small molecule machine-learned interatomic potential (MLIP). OmniMol is built by adapting Omnilearned, a foundation model for particle jets found in high-energy physics (HEP) experiments such as at the Large Hadron Collider (LHC). Omnilearned is built with a Point-Edge-Transformer (PET) and pre-trained using a diverse set of one billion particle jets. It includes an interaction-matrix attention bias that injects pairwise sub-nuclear (HEP) or atomic (molecular-dynamics) physics directly into the transformer's attention logits, steering the network toward physically meaningful neighborhoods without sacrificing expressivity. We demonstrate OmniMol using the oMol dataset and find excellent performance even with relatively few examples for fine-tuning. This study lays the foundation for building interdisciplinary connections, given datasets represented as collections of point clouds.

AI.tldr: OmniMol是基于高能物理基础模型Omnilearned构建的小分子机器学习原子间势能模型，通过点云表示实现跨学科应用
AI.motivation: 利用高能物理中已预训练的基础模型，将其迁移到分子动力学领域，建立跨学科连接，减少分子模拟中的训练数据需求
AI.method: 采用点边变换器（PET）架构，引入交互矩阵注意力偏置机制，将成对原子物理信息直接注入注意力对数中，使用oMol数据集进行微调
AI.result: 即使使用相对较少的微调样本，OmniMol在分子模拟中也表现出优异的性能
AI.conclusion: 该研究为基于点云表示的数据集建立跨学科连接奠定了基础，展示了基础模型在不同科学领域间的可迁移性

title: The rise and fall of stretched bond errors: Extending the analysis of Perdew-Zunger self-interaction corrections of reaction barrier heights beyond the LSDA
summary: Incorporating self-interaction corrections (SIC) significantly improves chemical reaction barrier height predictions made using density functional theory methods. We present a detailed, orbital-by-orbital analysis of these corrections for three semi-local density functional approximations (DFAs) situated on the three lowest rungs of the Jacob's Ladder of approximations. The analysis is based on Fermi-Löwdin Orbital Self-Interaction Correction calculations performed at several steps along the reaction pathway from the reactants (R) to the transition state (TS) to the products (P) for four representative reactions selected from the BH76 benchmark set. For all three functionals, the major contribution to self-interaction corrections of the barrier heights can be traced to stretched bond orbitals that develop near the TS configuration. The magnitude of the ratio of the self-exchange-correlation energy to the self-Hartree energy (XC/H) for a given orbital is introduced as an indicator of one-electron self-interaction error. For the exact, but unknown density functional, XC/H = 1.0 for all orbitals, while for the practical DFAs studied here, XC/H spans a range of values. The largest values are obtained for stretched or strongly lobed orbitals. We show that significant differences in XC/H for corresponding orbitals in the R, TS, and P configurations can be used to identify the major contributors to the SIC of barrier heights and reaction energies. Based on such comparisons, we suggest that barrier height predictions made using the SCAN meta-generalized gradient approximation may have attained the best accuracy possible for a semi-local functional using the Perdew-Zunger SIC approach.

AI.tldr: 自相互作用校正显著改善密度泛函理论对化学反应能垒的预测，研究通过轨道分析发现拉伸键轨道是主要贡献来源，并引入XC/H比值作为单电子自相互作用误差指标。
AI.motivation: 密度泛函理论中的自相互作用误差会影响化学反应能垒预测的准确性，需要深入理解自相互作用校正如何改善不同泛函的预测性能。
AI.method: 采用Fermi-Löwdin轨道自相互作用校正方法，对Jacob's Ladder中三个最低梯级的半局域密度泛函进行轨道层面的分析，研究BH76基准集中四个代表性反应的反应路径。
AI.result: 发现能垒高度自相互作用校正的主要贡献来自过渡态附近形成的拉伸键轨道；XC/H比值分析表明拉伸或强瓣状轨道的自相互作用误差最大；SCAN meta-GGA泛函在Perdew-Zunger SIC方法下可能达到了半局域泛函的最佳精度。
AI.conclusion: 轨道层面的XC/H比值分析能有效识别自相互作用校正的主要贡献者，为理解密度泛函理论中的自相互作用误差提供了新视角，并表明SCAN泛函在自相互作用校正下可能已达到半局域泛函的精度极限。

title: Giant anomalous Hall effect in ultrathin Si/Fe bilayers
summary: Anomalous Hall effect studies on ultrathin Si(50Angstrom)/Fe(t_Fe) bilayers were performed at 300 K. Giant enhancements of about 60 times in saturation anomalous Hall resistivity and 265 times in anomalous Hall coefficient (R_s) were observed upon decreasing the Fe layer thickness t_Fe from 200 to 10 Angstrom. The R_s observed for t_Fe = 10 Angstrom is about three orders of magnitude larger than that of bulk Fe. The scaling law between R_s and longitudinal electrical resistivity (Rho) suggests that the side jump is the dominant mechanism of the anomalous Hall effect. The observed largest Hall sensitivity of 433 Ohm/T surpasses that of the semiconducting GaAs and InAs Hall sensors already reported.

AI.tldr: 在Si/Fe双层膜中，当Fe层厚度从200Å减小到10Å时，反常霍尔效应显著增强，霍尔系数增大了265倍，霍尔灵敏度达到433Ω/T，超越了半导体霍尔传感器。
AI.motivation: 研究超薄Si/Fe双层膜中反常霍尔效应的厚度依赖性，探索反常霍尔效应的增强机制及其在霍尔传感器应用中的潜力。
AI.method: 在300K下对Si(50Å)/Fe(t_Fe)双层膜进行反常霍尔效应测量，改变Fe层厚度(t_Fe从200Å到10Å)，分析反常霍尔电阻率、霍尔系数与纵向电阻率之间的标度关系。
AI.result: Fe层厚度减小导致反常霍尔效应显著增强：饱和反常霍尔电阻率增大约60倍，反常霍尔系数(R_s)增大约265倍。t_Fe=10Å时，R_s比块体Fe大约三个数量级。标度关系表明侧跳机制占主导。最大霍尔灵敏度达到433Ω/T，超过已报道的GaAs和InAs半导体霍尔传感器。
AI.conclusion: 超薄Si/Fe双层膜中反常霍尔效应可通过减小Fe层厚度显著增强，侧跳机制是主要贡献。该体系具有优异的霍尔灵敏度，在霍尔传感器应用中具有潜力。

title: Superconductivity from the Slater mode: Application to KTaO3 heterostructures
summary: Superconductivity has been observed for the 2D electron gas (2DEG) at the interface of KTaO3 with other oxides, with a transition temperature about an order of magnitude higher than its 3d cousin SrTiO3. The superconducting transition temperature is strongly dependent on the orientation of the interface. Motivated by this observation, we study pairing due to exchange of the soft transverse optic phonon mode characteristic of quantum paraelectrics and use the resulting theory to comment on the nature of superconductivity of this 2DEG. We find (1) an orientation dependence consistent with experiment along with an anisotropic gap function, but (2) a BCS coupling constant that is smaller than needed and so must be augmented by contributions from other phonons to be consistent with the observed values of Tc.

AI.tldr: 研究KTaO₃界面2D电子气的超导性，发现其Tc比SrTiO₃高约10倍，且强烈依赖于界面取向，理论分析表明软横向光学声子模式配对机制能解释取向依赖性，但需要其他声子贡献才能达到实验观测的Tc值。
AI.motivation: 实验观察到KTaO₃界面2D电子气的超导转变温度比SrTiO₃高约一个数量级，且强烈依赖于界面取向，这激发了研究量子顺电体中软横向光学声子模式交换配对机制的兴趣。
AI.method: 研究量子顺电体中软横向光学声子模式交换引起的配对机制，建立理论模型分析2D电子气的超导性，特别关注界面取向对超导性质的影响。
AI.result: 1) 理论预测的界面取向依赖性与实验一致，并得到各向异性的能隙函数；2) 但BCS耦合常数太小，需要其他声子的贡献才能达到实验观测的超导转变温度。
AI.conclusion: 软横向光学声子模式交换配对机制能解释KTaO₃界面2D电子气超导的取向依赖性，但需要结合其他声子贡献才能完全解释实验观测的超导转变温度。

title: Surface Functional Renormalization Group for Layered Quantum Materials
summary: We present an extension to the two-dimensional functional renormalization group to efficiently treat interactions on the surface or at interfaces of three-dimensional systems. As an application, we consider a semi-infinite stack of two-dimensional square lattices, including a Hubbard interaction on the surface layer and an alternating interlayer coupling. We investigate how strongly correlated states of the decoupled two-dimensional Hubbard model on the surface evolve under inclusion of such an SSH-like interlayer coupling. For large parts of the phase diagram as a function of the interlayer hopping parameters, the physics of the two-dimensional system prevails, with antiferromagnetic, superconducting d-wave, and ferromagnetic correlations taking center stage. However, for intermediate interlayer couplings the superconducting state at intermediate interaction strengths separates into two regimes by a small region of incommensurate spin-density-wave and spin-bond order, enabling the potential realization of chiral spin-bond order.

AI.tldr: 扩展二维功能重整化群方法处理三维系统表面/界面相互作用，研究半无限二维方晶格堆叠的表面Hubbard模型在SSH类层间耦合下的强关联态演化。
AI.motivation: 现有方法难以高效处理三维系统表面或界面的相互作用，需要开发新方法来研究表面强关联态在层间耦合下的演化。
AI.method: 扩展二维功能重整化群方法，应用于半无限二维方晶格堆叠系统，包含表面层的Hubbard相互作用和交替层间耦合。
AI.result: 大部分相图中二维系统的物理特性占主导（反铁磁、d波超导、铁磁关联），但中等层间耦合下，中等相互作用强度的超导态分裂为两个区域，中间出现非公度自旋密度波和自旋键序的小区域，可能实现手性自旋键序。
AI.conclusion: 扩展的功能重整化群方法能有效研究表面强关联态在层间耦合下的演化，揭示了中等耦合下超导态分裂和手性自旋键序出现的可能性。

title: Eigen Microstate Condensation and Critical Phenomena in the Lennard-Jones Fluid
summary: Despite extensive study of the liquid-gas phase transition, accurately determining the critical point and the critical exponents in fluid systems through direct simulation remains a challenge. We employ the eigen microstate theory (EMT) to investigate the liquid-gas continuous phase transition in the Lennard-Jones (LJ) fluid within the canonical ensemble. In EMT, the probability amplitudes of eigen microstates serve as the order parameter. Using finite-size scaling of probability amplitudes, we simultaneously determine the critical temperature, $T_c = 1.188(2)$, and critical density, $ρ_c = 0.320(4)$. Furturemore, we obtain critical exponents of the LJ fluid, $β= 0.32(2)$ and $ν= 0.64(3)$, which demonstrate a great agreement with the Ising universality class. This method also reveals the mesoscopic structure of the emergent phase, characterizing the three-dimensional (3D) spatial configuration of the fluid in the critical region. This work also confirms the finite-size scaling behavior of the probability amplitudes of the eigen microstates in the critical region. The EMT provides a powerful tool for studying the critical phenomena of complex fluid system.

AI.tldr: 使用本征微观态理论研究Lennard-Jones流体的液-气相变，通过概率幅的有限尺寸标度同时确定临界参数和临界指数，结果与Ising普适类一致。
AI.motivation: 尽管对液-气相变进行了广泛研究，但通过直接模拟准确确定流体系统的临界点和临界指数仍然具有挑战性。需要一种有效的方法来研究复杂流体系统的临界现象。
AI.method: 采用本征微观态理论（EMT）研究Lennard-Jones流体在正则系综中的连续相变。使用本征微观态的概率幅作为序参数，通过概率幅的有限尺寸标度分析来确定临界参数。
AI.result: 同时确定了临界温度Tc=1.188(2)和临界密度ρc=0.320(4)，获得了临界指数β=0.32(2)和ν=0.64(3)，与Ising普适类高度一致。该方法还揭示了临界区域中流体三维空间构型的介观结构。
AI.conclusion: 本征微观态理论为研究复杂流体系统的临界现象提供了有力工具，并证实了临界区域中本征微观态概率幅的有限尺寸标度行为。

title: Combining laser ablation and Sol-Gel techniques for the synthesis of nanostructured organic-inorganic matrices
summary: In this work we report a new and simple method that combines the pulsed laser ablation in liquids (PLAL) and the Sol-Gel techniques to obtain nanocomposite glasses and gelatins. Gold nanoparticles (Au-NPs) are generated by PLAL using the corresponding target. The target is submerged in a transparent liquid solution made previously with tetraetylorthosilicate (TEOS) adding diluted hydrochloric acid as catalyzer. In the case of gelatins commercial gelatin and tap water are used. The laser source is a Nd:YAG laser emitting at 1064 nm, with an energy of 100 mJ and 8 ns pulse duration at 10 Hz repetition rate focused on the target in a 2 mm diameter laser spot. The ablation time is 10 min for the glasses and gelatins. The Au-NPs are uniformly dispersed in the solution. After the ablation process the gels are sealed and stored at room temperature for several days. The samples are characterized by UV-Vis spectroscopy, HRTEM, ellipsometry and AFM microscopy, these measurements reveal optical transparency and a refractive index near 1.45 for the pure glass, whereas a colorful aspect, a refractive index of 1.42, and a small surface roughness of 1.92 nm for the glass containing Au-NPs. In the case of gelatins self-sustained flexible films are obtained.

AI.tldr: 结合脉冲激光液体烧蚀(PLAL)和溶胶-凝胶技术制备含金纳米颗粒的纳米复合玻璃和明胶的新方法
AI.motivation: 开发一种简单的方法来制备含有均匀分散金纳米颗粒的纳米复合材料，用于光学应用
AI.method: 使用Nd:YAG激光(1064nm, 100mJ, 8ns, 10Hz)在含有TEOS和盐酸催化剂的溶液中烧蚀金靶，通过PLAL生成金纳米颗粒，然后通过溶胶-凝胶过程形成玻璃或明胶复合材料
AI.result: 成功制备了含金纳米颗粒的透明玻璃和柔性明胶薄膜；玻璃样品显示1.42折射率、1.92nm表面粗糙度和彩色外观；明胶形成自支撑柔性薄膜
AI.conclusion: PLAL与溶胶-凝胶技术结合是制备含均匀分散金纳米颗粒纳米复合材料的有效方法，可用于光学和柔性材料应用

title: Chemically decisive benchmarks on the path to quantum utility
summary: Progress towards quantum utility in chemistry requires not only algorithmic advances, but also the identification of chemically meaningful problems whose electronic structure fundamentally challenges classical methods. Here, we introduce a curated hierarchy of chemically decisive benchmark systems designed to probe distinct regimes of electronic correlation relevant to molecular, bioinorganic, and heavy-element chemistry. Moving beyond minimal toy models, our benchmark set spans multireference bond breaking (N$_2$), high-spin transition-metal chemistry (FeS), biologically relevant iron-sulfur clusters ([2Fe-2S]), and actinide-actinide bonding (U$_2$), which exhibits extreme sensitivity to active-space choice, relativistic treatment, and correlation hierarchy even within advanced multireference frameworks. As a concrete realization, we benchmark a recently developed automated and adaptive quantum algorithm based on generator-coordinate-inspired subspace expansion,ADAPT-GCIM, using a black-box workflow that integrates entropy-based active-space selection via the ActiveSpaceFinder tool. Across this chemically diverse problem set, ADAPT-GCIM achieves high accuracy in challenging correlation regimes. Equally importantly, these benchmarks expose general failure modes and design constraints-independent of any specific algorithm-highlighting the necessity of problem-aware and correlation-specific strategies for treating strongly correlated chemistry on quantum computers. To support systematic benchmarking and reproducible comparisons, the Hamiltonians for all systems studied are made openly available.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一套化学基准测试系统，用于评估量子算法在挑战性电子关联问题上的表现，并展示了ADAPT-GCIM算法在这些问题上的高精度性能。
AI.motivation: 量子计算在化学中的应用需要识别那些对经典方法具有根本性挑战的化学问题，而不仅仅是算法进步。需要超越最小玩具模型，建立能够探测不同电子关联机制的化学相关基准系统。
AI.method: 构建了一个分层次的化学基准系统，涵盖多参考态键断裂(N₂)、高自旋过渡金属化学(FeS)、生物相关的铁硫簇([2Fe-2S])和锕系-锕系键合(U₂)。使用ADAPT-GCIM量子算法（基于生成器坐标启发的子空间扩展）进行基准测试，结合ActiveSpaceFinder工具进行熵基活性空间选择。
AI.result: ADAPT-GCIM算法在这个化学多样的问题集上，在挑战性关联机制中实现了高精度。同时，这些基准测试揭示了独立于特定算法的一般性失败模式和设计约束。
AI.conclusion: 需要针对特定问题和关联机制的策略来处理强关联化学问题。论文提供了所有研究系统的哈密顿量以支持系统化基准测试和可重复比较，强调了问题感知和关联特定策略在量子计算机处理强关联化学中的必要性。

title: Two-dimensional Intrinsic Janus Structures: Design Principle and Anomalous Nonlinear Optics
summary: Two-dimensional Janus structures have garnered rapidly growing attention across multidisciplinary fields. However, despite extensive theoretical and experimental efforts, a principle for designing intrinsic Janus materials remains elusive. Here, we propose a first-principles alloy theory based on cluster expansion, incorporating a strong repulsive interaction of a cation-mediated anion-pair cluster and refined short-range cluster-cluster competitions, to unravel the formation mechanism of intrinsic Janus structures with a distorted 1T phase among numerous competing phases. Our theory not only explains why intrinsic Janus structures are accidentally observed in RhSeCl and BiTeI which are composed of alloyed elements from different groups, but also accurately predicts a wide range of 1T-like intrinsic Janus materials that are ready for synthesis. Intriguingly, as demonstrated in the case of RhSeCl, we reveal that intrinsic Janus materials can exhibit anomalous second-harmonic generation (SHG) with a distinct quantum geometric effect, originating from strong lattice and chemical-potential mirror asymmetry. Furthermore, a novel skin effect unexpectedly emerges in finite-thickness RhSeCl, accompanied by a hidden SHG effect within the bulk region. Our theory paves the way for the ab initio design of intrinsic Janus materials, significantly accelerating progress in Janus science.

AI.tldr: 提出基于团簇展开的第一性原理合金理论，解释内在Janus结构的形成机制，预测新材料，并揭示其异常二次谐波生成和皮肤效应
AI.motivation: 尽管二维Janus结构在多学科领域受到广泛关注，但设计内在Janus材料的原理仍然不明确。现有理论无法解释为什么内在Janus结构会偶然出现在RhSeCl和BiTeI等由不同族元素组成的合金中。
AI.method: 提出基于团簇展开的第一性原理合金理论，包含阳离子介导的阴离子对团簇的强排斥相互作用和精炼的短程团簇-团簇竞争，以揭示内在Janus结构在众多竞争相中的形成机制。
AI.result: 理论不仅解释了RhSeCl和BiTeI中偶然观察到的内在Janus结构，还准确预测了多种可合成的1T类内在Janus材料。在RhSeCl中揭示了异常的二次谐波生成和量子几何效应，并发现有限厚度RhSeCl中出现新颖的皮肤效应和体区隐藏的SHG效应。
AI.conclusion: 该理论为内在Janus材料的从头设计开辟了道路，显著加速了Janus科学的发展。

title: Coexisting electronic smectic liquid crystal and superconductivity in a Si square-net semimetal
comment: 9 pages, 8 figures. Accepted for publication in Physical Review Letters
summary: Electronic nematic and smectic liquid crystals are spontaneous symmetry-breaking phases that are seen to precede or coexist with enigmatic unconventional superconducting states in multiple classes of materials. In this Letter we describe scanning tunneling microscopy observations of a short ranged charge stripe (smectic) order in NaAlSi, whose superconductivity is speculated to have an unconventional origin. As well as this we resolve a clear spatial modulation of the superconducting gap amplitude, which arises due to the intertwined superconducting and smectic orders. Numerical calculations help to understand the possible driving mechanism as a suppression of kinetic energy on the Fermi surface formed in part by two large, flat-topped hole pockets of p-orbital character.

AI.tldr: NaAlSi中观察到短程电荷条纹（近晶）序与超导间隙振幅的空间调制，表明超导与近晶序相互交织，可能由p轨道大扁平空穴袋的动能抑制驱动
AI.motivation: 研究电子向列和近晶液晶相（自发对称性破缺相）如何与非常规超导态共存或先于其出现，特别是在NaAlSi中探索可能的非常规超导起源
AI.method: 使用扫描隧道显微镜观察NaAlSi中的短程电荷条纹（近晶）序，并解析超导间隙振幅的空间调制，结合数值计算分析可能的驱动机制
AI.result: 观察到NaAlSi中存在短程电荷条纹序，并发现超导间隙振幅的清晰空间调制，表明超导序与近晶序相互交织；数值计算表明驱动机制可能是由p轨道特征的两个大扁平空穴袋形成的费米面上的动能抑制
AI.conclusion: NaAlSi中观察到的超导与近晶序的相互交织现象，支持了其超导性可能具有非常规起源的推测，并揭示了由特定费米面结构驱动的动能抑制机制

title: Spontaneous Anomalous Hall Effect at Room Temperature in Antiferromagnetic Material NbMnAs
summary: Recent studies have shown that certain antiferromagnetic (AFM) materials with the same symmetry breaking as ferromagnets can generate sufficiently large ferromagnetic (FM) responses. Here, we report that the new AFM material NbMnAs exhibits a large anomalous Hall effect (AHE) at zero field and at room temperature, despite having only a small net magnetization. A polycrystalline sample of NbMnAs, likely close to stoichiometric composition, exhibited an AFM state with a small spontaneous magnetization of approximately $6 \times 10^{-3} μ_{\rm B}$/Mn and the AHE below $T_{\rm N}=354\,{\rm K}$. In contrast, single crystals of NbMnAs obtained by a flux method exhibited a deficiency at the As site, {which resulted} in a decrease in $T_{\rm N}$ and an increase in spontaneous magnetization. Although improvement of the single-crystal growth is still required, our study reveals that NbMnAs is a novel material capable of exhibiting significant FM responses derived from antiferromagnetism at room temperature.

AI.tldr: NbMnAs是一种新型反铁磁材料，在室温下表现出大的反常霍尔效应，尽管净磁化强度很小，这源于其反铁磁序产生的类铁磁响应。
AI.motivation: 探索具有与铁磁体相同对称性破缺的反铁磁材料，这些材料能够产生足够大的铁磁响应，特别是在室温下实现大的反常霍尔效应。
AI.method: 制备多晶和单晶NbMnAs样品，多晶样品接近化学计量比，单晶样品通过助熔剂法生长但存在As位点缺陷。测量样品的磁化强度、反常霍尔效应和奈尔温度。
AI.result: 多晶NbMnAs在TN=354K以下表现出反常霍尔效应，自发磁化强度约6×10⁻³ μB/Mn。单晶样品由于As位点缺陷导致TN降低和自发磁化强度增加。两种样品都显示出室温下显著的反常霍尔效应。
AI.conclusion: NbMnAs是一种新型材料，能够在室温下表现出源于反铁磁性的显著铁磁响应，为开发基于反铁磁材料的自旋电子学器件提供了有前景的平台。

title: Exact solution of a two-dimensional (2D) Ising model with the next nearest interactions
comment: 23 pages, 3 figures. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:2512.16935
summary: The exact solution of a two-dimensional (2D) Ising model with the next nearest interactions at zero magnetic field is derived. At first, the transfer matrices are analyzed in three representations, i.e., Clifford algebraic representation, transfer tensor representation and schematic representation, to inspect nontrivial topological structures in this system. The system is equivalent to a triangular Ising model plus an interaction along the z axis, so that the approaches developed for the 3D Ising model are modified to be appropriable for solving the exact solution of the 2D Ising model with the next nearest interactions. The partition function and the spontaneous magnetization are obtained. The comparison with the exact solutions of other Ising lattices reveals that either the increase of the number of interactions in a unit cell or the presence/increase of topological contributions enhances the critical point of the Ising lattices. The results obtained in this work are helpful for understanding the physical properties of the 2D magnetic materials.

AI.tldr: 本文推导了零磁场下具有次近邻相互作用的二维伊辛模型的精确解，通过三种表示分析转移矩阵，揭示了系统的非平凡拓扑结构，并获得了配分函数和自发磁化强度。
AI.motivation: 研究具有次近邻相互作用的二维伊辛模型的精确解，以理解二维磁性材料的物理性质，特别是拓扑结构对系统临界行为的影响。
AI.method: 采用三种表示分析转移矩阵：克利福德代数表示、转移张量表示和示意图表示；将系统等效为三角伊辛模型加上z轴相互作用，并修改三维伊辛模型的方法来求解该二维模型的精确解。
AI.result: 获得了配分函数和自发磁化强度的精确解；发现单位晶格中相互作用数量的增加或拓扑贡献的存在/增强会提高伊辛晶格的临界点。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为理解二维磁性材料的物理性质提供了帮助，揭示了拓扑结构在决定系统临界行为中的重要作用。

title: Optical probing of magnons and phonons in Ni80Fe20 nanodot arrays
summary: Control of collective spin excitations by static or dynamic strain is an emerging phenomenon that requires in-depth understanding for design of future spin-wave-regulated devices. Here, we explore mutually interacting spin waves and acoustic wave modes in addition to few non-interactive modes through all optical excitation in ordered arrays of Ni80Fe20 nanomagnets. The acoustic wave originated from elastic deformation resonantly couple to the spin wave via magnetoelastic effect at their overlapping frequency. We demonstrate that the choice of the lattice type in which the magnetic nanodots are arranged is crucial for the observation of the magnetoelastic interaction. Therefore, the study shows that the simultaneous existence of elastic wave and spin wave offer ingeneously advantageous features to pave the way of energy-efficient magnetoacoustic devices.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过光学激发在Ni80Fe20纳米磁体有序阵列中探索了自旋波与声波模式的相互作用，发现晶格类型选择对磁弹性相互作用观测至关重要，为高效磁声器件设计提供了新途径。
AI.motivation: 研究集体自旋激发通过静态或动态应变控制的机制，这对于设计未来自旋波调控器件至关重要。需要深入理解自旋波与声波之间的相互作用，以实现能量高效的磁声器件。
AI.method: 采用全光学激发方法，在有序排列的Ni80Fe20纳米磁体阵列中研究自旋波与声波模式的相互作用。通过磁弹性效应，在重叠频率处实现声波与自旋波的共振耦合，特别关注不同晶格类型对磁弹性相互作用观测的影响。

title: Mesoscale Modelling of Confined Split-Hopkinson Pressure Bar Tests on Concrete: Effects of Internal Damage and Strain Rates
summary: The dynamic strength of concrete under complex loading conditions is a key consideration in the design and maintenance of infrastructures. To assess this mechanical property, Split Hopkinson Pressure Bar (SHPB) tests are typically adopted across a wide range of loading and confining conditions. In this study, mesoscale modelling based on the finite element method (FEM) is employed to simulate SHPB tests on three-phase concrete with realistic aggregate shape, in order to investigate the effects of loading ramp rate, internal friction, and confining pressure on the dynamic increase factor (DIF). Microscopic evidence to explain these effects is explored through analysing the distributions of the internal strain rate and local damage. As key results, increasing loading ramp rates, internal friction, and confining pressure can generally leads to higher DIF values. Only a higher loading ramp rate significantly amplifies the strain-rate effect on the DIF, as evidenced by pronounced increases in both internal strain rate and damage in the mortar and aggregate phases. In contrast, higher internal friction and confining pressure weaken the strain-rate effect on the DIF. Both can be attributed to the mortar phase, which shows a less pronounced increase in damage with increasing strain rate. This study enriches the understanding of the dynamic fracture of concrete toward complex loading scenarios.

AI.tldr: 该研究采用细观尺度有限元模拟真实骨料形状的三相混凝土SHPB试验，探究加载速率、内摩擦和围压对动态增强因子(DIF)的影响机制。
AI.motivation: 复杂荷载条件下混凝土的动态强度是基础设施设计和维护的关键考虑因素。传统SHPB试验虽广泛用于评估这一力学性能，但需要更深入理解加载速率、内摩擦和围压对动态增强因子的微观影响机制。
AI.method: 采用基于有限元法的细观尺度建模，模拟具有真实骨料形状的三相混凝土的SHPB试验。通过分析内部应变率和局部损伤分布，探索微观证据来解释加载速率、内摩擦和围压对DIF的影响。
AI.result: 增加加载速率、内摩擦和围压通常会导致更高的DIF值。只有更高的加载速率显著放大了DIF的应变率效应，表现为砂浆和骨料相内部应变率和损伤的明显增加。相比之下，更高的内摩擦和围压会减弱DIF的应变率效应，这主要归因于砂浆相随应变率增加损伤增加不明显。
AI.conclusion: 该研究丰富了复杂加载场景下混凝土动态断裂的理解，揭示了不同因素对DIF影响机制的微观差异，为混凝土结构在动态荷载下的设计和评估提供了理论依据。

title: Majorana Zero Modes and Topological Nature in Bi2Ta3S6-family Superconductors
summary: In this work, we report that Bi2Ta3S6-family superconductors exhibit nontrivial band topology. They possess a natural quantum-well structure consisting of alternating stacks of TaS2 and honeycomb Bi layers, which contribute superconducting and topological properties, respectively. Symmetry-based indicators $(\mathbb{Z}_4;\mathbb{Z}_{2}\mathbb{Z}_{2}\mathbb{Z}_{2})=(2;000)$ reveal that the topological nature arises entirely from the Bi layers, which belong to a quantum spin Hall phase characterized by a $p_x-p_y$ model on a honeycomb lattice. The topological zigzag (ZZ) and armchair (AC) edge states are obtained. Using VASP2KP, the in-plane $g$ factors of these topological edge states are computed from the ab initio calculations: $g_{x/y}^{\mathrm{ZZ}}=2.07/1.60$ and $g_{x/y}^{\mathrm{AC}}=0.50/0.06$. The strong anisotropy of the edge-state $g$ factors allows us to explore Majorana zero modes in the Bi monolayer on a superconductor, which can be obtained by exfoliation or molecular beam epitaxy. The relaxed structures of the Bi2Ta3Se6, Bi2Nb3S6 and Bi2Nb3Se6 are obtained. Their superconducting transition temperature $T_c$ are estimated based on the electron-phonon coupling and the McMillan formula. Furthermore, using the experimental superconducting gap $Δ$ and the computed $g$ factors, we obtain the phase diagram, which shows that the in-plane field $B_y>2.62\mathrm{ T}$ can generate corner Majorana zero modes in the Bi monolayer of the superconductor Bi2Ta3S6. A similar paradigm also applies to the Bi2Ta3S6 bulk with the emergence of Majorana hinge states. These natural quantum-well superconductors therefore offer ideal platforms for exploring topological superconductivity and Majorana zero modes.

AI.tldr: Bi2Ta3S6家族超导体具有非平庸的能带拓扑结构，其量子阱结构由TaS2层和蜂窝状Bi层交替堆叠而成，分别贡献超导性和拓扑性质。拓扑边缘态的强各向异性g因子可用于探索Majorana零模。
AI.motivation: 探索具有天然量子阱结构的Bi2Ta3S6家族超导体中的拓扑超导性和Majorana零模，这些材料为研究拓扑超导提供了理想平台。
AI.method: 使用对称性指标分析拓扑性质，通过VASP2KP从第一性原理计算边缘态的g因子，基于电子-声子耦合和McMillan公式估算超导转变温度，结合实验超导能隙和计算g因子获得相图。
AI.result: 发现Bi层属于量子自旋霍尔相，具有拓扑边缘态；计算得到锯齿形和扶手椅形边缘态的强各向异性g因子；估算出Bi2Ta3S6家族的超导转变温度；相图显示面内磁场By>2.62T可在Bi单层中产生角Majorana零模。
AI.conclusion: Bi2Ta3S6家族天然量子阱超导体为探索拓扑超导性和Majorana零模提供了理想平台，其拓扑性质源于Bi层，超导性源于TaS2层，强各向异性g因子使得在相对较低磁场下即可实现Majorana零模。

title: Three-dimensional topological insulator feature of ternary chalcogenide Ge2Bi2Te5
summary: The exploration of novel topological insulators (TIs) beyond binary chalcogenides has been accelerated in pursuit of exotic quantum states and device applications. Here, the layered ternary chalcogenide Ge2Bi2Te5 is identified as a three-dimensional TI. The bulk electronic structure of Ge2Bi2Te5 features a hole-type Fermi surface at Fermi level EF, which dominates the transport properties. Moreover, an unoccupied topological surface state with a Dirac point located at 290 meV above EF has been observed. Theoretical calculations confirm a bulk bandgap and a nontrivial Z2 topological invariant (000;1). The present study demonstrates that the material family of layered tetradymite-like ternary compounds is an important platform to explore exotic topological phenomena.

AI.tldr: Ge2Bi2Te5被鉴定为三维拓扑绝缘体，具有290 meV以上的狄拉克点表面态和非平凡Z2拓扑不变量
AI.motivation: 探索超越二元硫族化合物的新型拓扑绝缘体，以追求奇异量子态和设备应用
AI.method: 通过实验观测Ge2Bi2Te5的体电子结构和表面态，结合理论计算验证其拓扑性质
AI.result: 发现Ge2Bi2Te5具有空穴型费米面、290 meV以上的未占据拓扑表面态，理论计算确认其体带隙和非平凡Z2拓扑不变量(000;1)
AI.conclusion: 层状类辉铋矿三元化合物材料家族是探索奇异拓扑现象的重要平台

title: Irreversible Kinetics Emerges from Bayesian Inference over Admissible Histories
comment: 6 pages, no figures. Probabilistic formulation of irreversible kinetics
summary: A probabilistic formulation of irreversible kinetics is introduced in which incrementally admissible histories are weighted by a Gibbs-type measure built from an energy-dissipation action and observation constraints, with Theta controlling epistemic uncertainty. This measure can be interpreted as a Bayesian posterior over histories. In the zero-uncertainty limit, it concentrates on maximum-a-posteriori (MAP) histories, recovering classical deterministic evolution by incremental minimization in the convex generalized-standard-material setting, while allowing multiple competing MAP histories for non-convex energies or temporally coupled constraints. This emergence is demonstrated across seven distinct forward-in-time examples and an inverse inference problem of unknown histories from sparse observations via a global constrained minimum-action principle.

AI.tldr: 提出了一种不可逆动力学的概率表述，通过Gibbs型测度对增量可容许历史进行加权，该测度基于能量耗散作用和观测约束构建，Theta控制认知不确定性。该测度可解释为历史的贝叶斯后验。在零不确定性极限下，它集中于最大后验历史，在凸广义标准材料设置中恢复经典的确定性演化，同时允许非凸能量或时间耦合约束下的多个竞争MAP历史。
AI.motivation: 传统不可逆动力学通常采用确定性方法，但存在局限性：1）无法处理认知不确定性；2）在非凸能量或复杂约束下可能无法捕捉多个竞争演化路径；3）缺乏从稀疏观测推断未知历史的概率框架。需要一种统一的概率框架来同时处理确定性演化、多路径竞争和逆推断问题。
AI.method: 引入基于能量耗散作用和观测约束的Gibbs型概率测度，对增量可容许历史进行加权。该测度可解释为贝叶斯后验分布。参数Theta控制认知不确定性水平。在零不确定性极限下，测度集中于最大后验历史。通过全局约束最小作用原理解决从稀疏观测推断未知历史的逆问题。
AI.result: 在七个不同的正向时间示例中证明了该框架的有效性，展示了从概率测度到确定性演化的自然过渡。在逆推断问题中，成功从稀疏观测重建未知历史。该框架能够：1）在凸设置中恢复经典确定性演化；2）处理非凸能量下的多个竞争MAP历史；3）通过最小作用原理解决逆问题。
AI.conclusion: 提出的概率框架为不可逆动力学提供了统一的表述，能够同时处理确定性演化、多路径竞争和逆推断问题。该框架将经典确定性方法作为特例包含在内，同时通过贝叶斯后验解释和认知不确定性参数Theta提供了更丰富的概率视角，为复杂材料行为和逆问题提供了新的分析工具。

title: Unconventional thermal conductivity of suspended zigzag graphene nanomesh
comment: 6 pages, 5 figures, it is due for consideration for the Journal 2D Materials
summary: Compared to the study of graphene itself, the study of nano-structured graphene is rather limited because it is difficult to prepare atomically ordered edges. In this study, we have fabricated a periodically patterned mesh structure of graphene with atomically precise zigzag edges (zGNM: zigzag graphene nanomesh) and studied its thermal conductivity ($κ$) by opto-thermal Raman measurement. Unintuitively, it is found that the $κ$ of zGNM of 2,3 monolayers (MLs) thick is inversely proportional to the nanoribbon width ($W$), while that of zGNM of 5$\sim$10 MLs thick is independent of $W$ down to 30 nm. Since the $κ$ of suspended zigzag graphene nanoribbons (zGNRs) is suppressed by decreasing $W$, this nonclassical behavior of zGNM is due to the mesh structure. In addition, zGNRs show a higher $κ$ than GNRs with atomically rough edges. This is probably due to the atomically ordered zigzag edges.

AI.tldr: 制备了具有原子级精确锯齿边缘的石墨烯纳米网格结构，发现其热导率随厚度不同呈现非经典行为：2-3层时与纳米带宽度成反比，5-10层时与宽度无关。
AI.motivation: 相比石墨烯本身，纳米结构石墨烯的研究有限，主要因为难以制备原子级有序的边缘。本研究旨在探索具有原子级精确锯齿边缘的石墨烯纳米网格的热导性质。
AI.method: 制备了周期性图案化的石墨烯纳米网格结构（zGNM），具有原子级精确的锯齿边缘。使用光热拉曼测量技术研究其热导率，并与悬浮锯齿石墨烯纳米带（zGNRs）进行比较。
AI.result: 发现zGNM的热导率行为取决于厚度：2-3层时与纳米带宽度成反比，而5-10层时在宽度降至30nm时仍保持与宽度无关。此外，锯齿边缘石墨烯纳米带的热导率高于原子级粗糙边缘的纳米带。
AI.conclusion: 石墨烯纳米网格结构导致热导率的非经典行为，而原子级有序的锯齿边缘有助于提高热导率，这为纳米结构石墨烯的热管理应用提供了新见解。

title: Chemical Origin of Exciton Self-trapping in Cs$_3$Cu$_2$X$_5$ Cesium Copper Halides
summary: Copper halides Cs3Cu2X5 (X=Cl, Br, I) are promising materials for optoelectronic applications due to their high photoluminescence efficiency, stability, and large Stokes shifts. In this work, we uncover the chemical bonding origin of the Stokes shift in these materials using density functional theory calculations. Upon excitation, one [Cu2X5]3- anion undergoes sizeable local distortions, driven by Cu-X and Cu-Cu bond formation. These structural changes coincide with the formation of a self-trapped exciton, where particularly the hole is strongly localized on one anion. Analysis of the electronic structure and bonding reveals reduced antibonding interactions and enhanced bonding character in the excited state, stabilizing the distorted geometry. Our results establish a direct link between orbital-specific hole localization and bond formation. It provides a fundamental understanding of the excitation mechanism in Cs3Cu2X5 and offers design principles to tune optical properties in 0D copper halides.

AI.tldr: 本文通过DFT计算揭示了Cs3Cu2X5中斯托克斯位移的化学键合起源，发现激发态下[Cu2X5]3-阴离子的局部畸变导致自陷激子形成，空穴局域化驱动Cu-X和Cu-Cu键形成，从而稳定畸变几何结构。
AI.motivation: Cs3Cu2X5（X=Cl, Br, I）是光电应用的有前途材料，具有高光致发光效率、稳定性和大斯托克斯位移。然而，其斯托克斯位移的化学键合起源尚未明确，需要从电子结构和化学键角度深入理解激发机制。
AI.method: 采用密度泛函理论（DFT）计算，分析Cs3Cu2X5材料在基态和激发态下的电子结构、化学键合和几何畸变。特别关注[Cu2X5]3-阴离子的局部结构变化、自陷激子形成以及轨道特异性空穴局域化与键形成的关系。
AI.result: 激发导致[Cu2X5]3-阴离子发生显著局部畸变，由Cu-X和Cu-Cu键形成驱动。这些结构变化与自陷激子形成一致，其中空穴强烈局域在一个阴离子上。电子结构和键合分析显示激发态下反键相互作用减弱、键合特性增强，稳定了畸变几何结构。
AI.conclusion: 研究建立了轨道特异性空穴局域化与键形成之间的直接联系，为Cs3Cu2X5的激发机制提供了基础理解，并为调控零维铜卤化物的光学性质提供了设计原则。

title: Lattice dynamics and structural phase stability of group IV elemental solids with the r$^2$SCAN functional
summary: The strongly constrained and appropriately normed (SCAN) meta-GGA functional is a milestone achievement of electronic structure theory. Recently, a revised and restored form (r$^2$SCAN) has been suggested as a replacement for SCAN in high-throughput applications. Here, we assess the accuracy and reliability of the r$^2$SCAN meta-GGA functional for the group IV elemental solids carbon (C), silicon (Si), germanium (Ge), and tin (Sn). We show that the r$^2$SCAN functional agrees closely with its parent functional SCAN for elastic constants, bulk moduli, and phonon dispersions, but the numerical stability of r$^2$SCAN is superior. Both meta-GGA functionals outperform standard GGA (Perdew-Burke-Ernzerhof) in terms of accuracy and approach the level of common hybrid functionals (Heyd-Scuseria-Ernzerhof). However, we find that r$^2$SCAN performs much worse than SCAN for the $α\leftrightarrow β$ phase transition of both Ge and Sn, yielding larger phase energy differences and transition pressures.

AI.tldr: r²SCAN meta-GGA功能在IV族元素固体的弹性常数、体模量和声子色散方面与SCAN功能表现接近，数值稳定性更优，但在Ge和Sn的α↔β相变方面表现较差
AI.motivation: 评估修订后的r²SCAN meta-GGA功能在IV族元素固体（C、Si、Ge、Sn）中的准确性和可靠性，特别是在高吞吐量应用中作为SCAN的替代方案
AI.method: 比较r²SCAN与SCAN meta-GGA功能在IV族元素固体的弹性常数、体模量、声子色散以及相变行为方面的性能表现
AI.result: r²SCAN在数值稳定性上优于SCAN，在弹性常数、体模量和声子色散方面与SCAN表现接近，两者都优于标准GGA（PBE），接近常见杂化功能（HSE）的水平。但在Ge和Sn的α↔β相变方面，r²SCAN表现明显差于SCAN，产生更大的相能差和转变压力
AI.conclusion: r²SCAN在大多数性质上可作为SCAN的稳定替代方案，但在相变预测方面存在明显缺陷，需要谨慎使用

title: Oriented Triplet $p$-Wave Pairing from Fermi surface Anisotropy and Nonlocal Attraction
comment: 7 pages, 4 figures in the main text and 7 page, 4 figure in the supplemental material
summary: Using constrained-path quantum Monte Carlo, we map the ground-state phase diagram versus the nearest-neighbor (NN) attraction $V$ and spin-dependent hopping anisotropy $α$ for the two-dimensional attractive $t$--$U$--$V$ Hubbard model at filling $n\simeq0.85$. We identify an onsite $s$-wave superfluid, a Cooper pair Bose metal with an uncondensed Bose surface, and an oriented equal-spin triplet $p$-wave pairing phase. The NN attraction activates the odd-parity channel, while hopping anisotropy suppresses the competing $s$-wave coherence and selects a $p_x/p_y$ polar axis, and thus lowers the critical $|V_c|$ for the onset of triplet-dominant $p$-wave pairing. A channel-resolved Landau analysis provides a criterion for the Landau $p$-wave scale $V_c^{\mathrm L}(α)$, consistent with the observed anisotropy dependence of $|V_c|$. Our results establish how NN interaction and Fermi surface anisotropy cooperate to generate the oriented triplet $p$-wave pairing, and suggest that cold-atom and altermagnetic platforms could potentially realize this mechanism.

AI.tldr: 使用约束路径量子蒙特卡洛方法，研究二维吸引性t-U-V Hubbard模型在填充n≈0.85时的基态相图，发现最近邻吸引势V和自旋相关跳跃各向异性α共同作用可产生定向三重态p波配对相。
AI.motivation: 探索如何在二维吸引性Hubbard模型中实现三重态p波配对，特别是研究最近邻相互作用和费米面各向异性如何协同作用产生这种非常规超导相。
AI.method: 采用约束路径量子蒙特卡洛方法，在二维吸引性t-U-V Hubbard模型中，通过改变最近邻吸引势V和自旋相关跳跃各向异性α，系统研究基态相图。同时进行通道分辨的朗道分析，为p波配对提供理论判据。
AI.result: 识别出三种相：在位s波超流体、具有未凝聚玻色表面的库珀对玻色金属、以及定向等自旋三重态p波配对相。最近邻吸引势激活了奇宇称通道，而跳跃各向异性抑制了竞争的s波相干性并选择px/py极性轴，从而降低了三重态p波配对开始的临界|Vc|。
AI.conclusion: 最近邻相互作用和费米面各向异性协同作用可产生定向三重态p波配对，这一机制有望在冷原子和交变磁平台中实现。

title: Visualization of Tunable Electronic Structure of Monolayer TaIrTe$_4$
summary: Monolayer TaIrTe$_4$ has emerged as an attractive material platform to study intriguing phenomena related to topology and strong electron correlations. Recently, strong interactions have been demonstrated to induce strain and dielectric screening tunable topological phases such as quantum spin Hall insulator (QSHI), trivial insulator, higher-order topological insulator, and metallic phase, in the ground state of monolayer TaIrTe$_4$. Moreover, charge dosing has been demonstrated to convert the QSHI into a dual QSHI state. Although the band structure of monolayer TaIrTe$_4$ is central to interpreting its topological phases in transport experiments, direct experimental access to its intrinsic electronic structure has so far remained elusive. Here we report direct measurements of the monolayer TaIrTe$_4$ band structure using spatially resolved micro-angle-resolved photoemission spectroscopy (microARPES) with micrometre-scale resolution. The observed dispersions show quantitative agreement with density functional theory calculations using the Heyd-Scuseria-Ernzerhof hybrid functional, establishing the insulating ground state and revealing no evidence for strong electronic correlations. We further uncover a pronounced electron-hole asymmetry in the doping response. Whereas hole doping is readily induced by electrostatic gating, attempts to introduce electrons via gating or alkali metal deposition do not yield a rigid upward shift of the Fermi level. Fractional charge calculations demonstrate that added electrons instead drive band renormalization and shrink the band gap. Taken together, our experimental and theoretical results identify the microscopic mechanism by which induced charges reshape the band topology of monolayer TaIrTe$_4$, showing that doping can fundamentally alter the electronic structure beyond the rigid band behaviour that is typically assumed.

AI.tldr: 使用微米级分辨率的microARPES直接测量了单层TaIrTe₄的能带结构，发现与DFT计算一致，证实其为绝缘基态且无强电子关联证据，揭示了电子-空穴掺杂不对称性及掺杂对能带拓扑的重塑机制。
AI.motivation: 单层TaIrTe₄是研究拓扑和强电子关联现象的重要平台，但此前对其本征电子结构的直接实验测量一直缺失，而能带结构对解释其拓扑相变至关重要。
AI.method: 采用空间分辨的微角度分辨光电子能谱（microARPES）技术，结合密度泛函理论（DFT）计算，特别是Heyd-Scuseria-Ernzerhof杂化泛函，系统研究了单层TaIrTe₄的能带结构和掺杂响应。
AI.result: 实验观测到的色散与DFT计算定量一致，证实了绝缘基态且未发现强电子关联的证据；揭示了显著的电子-空穴不对称性：空穴掺杂容易实现，而电子掺杂不引起费米能级的刚性上移，而是通过能带重整化缩小带隙。
AI.conclusion: 掺杂能够从根本上改变单层TaIrTe₄的电子结构，超越通常假设的刚性带行为，揭示了诱导电荷重塑能带拓扑的微观机制，为理解该材料的拓扑相变提供了关键实验依据。

title: Nanoscale wireframe SQUID on a cantilever by corner lithography
summary: We present the fabrication of nanoscale superconducting quantum interference devices (SQUIDs) at the apex of wireframe tips on self-aligned superconducting cantilever probes. The probes are made on silicon wafers using molding techniques in combination with corner lithography, which results in a nanowire frame tip with a tuneable apex structure. A shadow effect deposition using magnetron sputtering of Nb creates self-aligned superconducting wireframes on cantilevers with accompanying device circuitry. Superconducting weak links are realized at the apex of the wireframes with the use of focused ion beam nanopatterning. The realized SQUIDs have effective diameters ranging from several micrometers down to 100 nm and can be operated in magnetic fields up to 1 T. Furthermore, the nanowires in the wireframe can be used to flux modulate the SQUID locally. This fabrication process enables the production of wafer-scale templates for probes based on on-tip superconducting devices.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了一种在自对准超导悬臂探针尖端制造纳米级超导量子干涉器件(SQUID)的新方法，器件直径可小至100纳米，能在高达1特斯拉的磁场中工作。
AI.motivation: 开发一种能够在纳米尺度上制造超导量子干涉器件的方法，并将其集成到悬臂探针尖端，用于高磁场环境下的纳米级磁测量应用。
AI.method: 采用硅晶圆上的成型技术与角光刻相结合，制造具有可调尖端结构的纳米线框架悬臂探针。通过磁控溅射Nb产生自对准超导线框架，并利用聚焦离子束纳米图案化在尖端实现超导弱连接，形成SQUID结构。
AI.result: 成功制造出有效直径从几微米到100纳米的SQUID器件，能够在高达1特斯拉的磁场中工作。纳米线框架可用于局部磁通调制，实现了晶圆级模板的批量生产。
AI.conclusion: 该制造工艺能够生产基于尖端超导器件的晶圆级探针模板，为纳米尺度磁测量和量子传感应用提供了新的平台。

title: Exact and Approximate Constants of Motion in Stochastic Contact Processes
summary: We study a variety of stochastic contact processes -- directly related to models of rumor and disease spreading -- from the viewpoint of their constants of motion, either exact or approximated. Much as in deterministic systems, constants of motion in stochastic dynamics make it possible to reduce the number of relevant variables, confining the set of accessible states, and thus facilitating their analytical treatment. For processes of rumor propagation based on the Maki-Thompson model, we show how to construct exact constants of motion as linear combinations of conserved quantities in each elementary contact event, and how they relate to the constants of motion of the corresponding mean-field equations, which are obtained as the continuous-time, large-size limit of the stochastic process. For SIR epidemic models, both in homogeneous systems and on heterogeneous networks, we find that a similar procedure produces approximate constants of motion, whose average value is preserved along the evolution. We also give examples of exact and approximate constants of motion built as nonlinear combinations of the relevant variables, whose expressions are suggested by their mean-field counterparts.

AI.tldr: 研究随机接触过程（谣言传播和疾病传播模型）中的守恒量，包括精确和近似守恒量，用于简化系统分析
AI.motivation: 随机动力学中的守恒量可以像确定性系统一样减少相关变量数量，限制可访问状态集，从而简化分析处理
AI.method: 对于Maki-Thompson谣言传播模型，通过基本接触事件中守恒量的线性组合构造精确守恒量；对于SIR流行病模型（同质系统和异质网络），采用类似方法构造近似守恒量；还构建了由相关变量非线性组合构成的精确和近似守恒量
AI.result: 展示了如何为谣言传播模型构造精确守恒量及其与平均场方程守恒量的关系；为SIR模型找到了近似守恒量，其平均值在演化过程中保持不变；给出了由平均场对应项启发的非线性守恒量示例
AI.conclusion: 守恒量方法为分析随机接触过程提供了有力工具，能够简化复杂系统的分析，特别是在谣言传播和疾病传播模型中

title: Impact ionization in narrow band gap CdHgTe quantum well with "resonant" band structure
summary: Impact ionization probabilities were calculated in a CdHgTe quantum well, where the distance between electron subbands is close to the band gap energy. This band structure enables impact ionization with small momentum transfer for electrons in the second subband. The study demonstrates that such processes increase the impact ionization probability by approximately two orders of magnitude compared to the impact ionization probability for electrons in the first subband, for which transitions with small momentum changes are impossible. The probability of single impact ionization during the electron energy loss due to optical phonon emission is estimated. Experimental methods for detecting impact ionization in this structure are discussed.

AI.tldr: CdHgTe量子阱中电子亚带间距接近带隙能量，使得第二亚带电子的碰撞电离概率比第一亚带高约两个数量级
AI.motivation: 研究CdHgTe量子阱中电子亚带间距接近带隙能量的特殊能带结构，探索小动量转移的碰撞电离过程，提高碰撞电离效率
AI.method: 计算CdHgTe量子阱中的碰撞电离概率，分析电子在不同亚带（第一和第二亚带）的碰撞电离过程，特别关注小动量转移的可能性，并估计光学声子发射过程中的单次碰撞电离概率

AI.conclusion: CdHgTe量子阱的特殊能带结构通过允许小动量转移的碰撞电离过程，显著提高了碰撞电离效率，为实验检测提供了理论基础

title: Vacuum-selected timescales in driven Josephson systems
summary: In this work, we demonstrate that the intrinsic timescale of a Josephson junction can be controlled through dynamical vacuum selection. By applying a Kapitza-like high-frequency drive to the system, the effective Josephson potential is reshaped, allowing for the stabilization of inphase or antiphase configuration. As a result, the Josephson plasma frequency, that is, the clock frequency of the junction, becomes a tunable property of the selected vacuum. Our findings establish a vacuum-controlled Josephson clock principle, in which the dynamical vacuum acts as an internal reference that fixes the operational timescale of Josephson oscillations, rather than this scale being imposed externally.

AI.tldr: 通过动态真空选择控制约瑟夫森结的本征时间尺度，实现可调约瑟夫森时钟
AI.motivation: 传统约瑟夫森结的时间尺度由外部参数固定，缺乏可调性。本研究旨在探索通过动态真空选择来控制约瑟夫森结本征时间尺度的可能性。
AI.method: 对约瑟夫森结施加类似Kapitza的高频驱动，重塑有效约瑟夫森势能，稳定同相或反相配置，从而控制约瑟夫森等离子体频率。
AI.result: 成功实现了约瑟夫森等离子体频率（结的时钟频率）的可调性，该频率成为所选真空的可调性质，建立了真空控制约瑟夫森时钟原理。
AI.conclusion: 动态真空选择可以作为内部参考来固定约瑟夫森振荡的操作时间尺度，而不是由外部强加，这为可调约瑟夫森时钟提供了新原理。

title: Conductance Oscillations in a Topological Insulator-Disordered Superconductor Hybrid Interface
summary: We report on the observation on proximity-induced superconductivity in the topological insulator BiSbTeSe2 coupled to a disordered superconductor, amorphous indium oxide (a-InO). Resistance temperature measurements reveal superconducting signatures at low temperatures, even when InO is in an insulating state, indicating the persistence of superconducting correlations. Differential conductance spectra reveal nearly periodic oscillations at higher bias, together with a pronounced zero-bias conductance peak. Both effect disappears at high temperature, marking the critical temperature (T*) of the superconducting islands in InO. These results underscore the influence of topological surface states on proximity-induced superconductivity and highlight the role of superconducting fluctuations in disordered superconductor/topological-insulator hybrid interfaces.

AI.tldr: 在拓扑绝缘体BiSbTeSe2与无序超导体a-InO的异质结中观察到邻近效应诱导的超导性，即使在InO处于绝缘态时仍存在超导关联，揭示了拓扑表面态对邻近效应的影响及无序超导体中涨落的作用。
AI.motivation: 研究拓扑绝缘体与无序超导体异质结中的邻近效应超导性，探索拓扑表面态如何影响超导关联的传播，以及无序超导体中的涨落对界面超导性的作用。
AI.method: 将拓扑绝缘体BiSbTeSe2与无序超导体非晶氧化铟(a-InO)耦合，通过电阻-温度测量观察低温超导特征，利用微分电导谱分析偏压振荡和零偏压电导峰。
AI.result: 即使在InO处于绝缘态时，低温下仍观察到超导特征；微分电导谱显示高偏压下的近周期性振荡和显著的零偏压电导峰；这些效应在高温下消失，对应于InO中超导岛的临界温度T*。
AI.conclusion: 拓扑表面态显著影响邻近效应诱导的超导性，无序超导体中的超导涨落在拓扑绝缘体/超导体异质结界面中起关键作用，为拓扑超导研究提供了新见解。

title: DFT modelling of stacking faults in hexagonal and cubic GaN
summary: We have performed density functional theory (DFT) calculations to characterize the energetics, and the atomic and electronic structure, of stacking faults in GaN, both in the stable hexagonal wurtzite (wz) phase and in the metastable cubic zincblende (zb) phase. In wz GaN, SFs on the (0001) planes can be divided into three different intrinsic stacking faults (I1, I2, and I3) and oneextrinsic stacking fault (E). In zb GaN, SFs form along (111) directions, giving one type each of intrinsic, extrinsic and twin SFs. Based on the calculated formation energy, I1 is the most stable SF of wz GaN in agreement with experiment. For zb GaN, the intrinsic stacking fault is the most dominant planar defect. To characterize the effect of the stacking faults on the electronic structure of the material, we examined the band density. We found that the bands near the valence band maximum in wz GaN are localised on the Ga-polar side of the stacking fault (i.e. on the Ga side of the Ga-N bonds perpendicular to the SF), with the bands near the conduction band minimum more on the N-polar side, though somewhat delocalised. We found the opposite trend in zb GaN; this behaviour is caused by a redistribution of charge near the interface. We also show the band offsets for the stacking faults, finding that they are very sensitive to local conditions, but can all be described as type II interfaces, with the presence of a stacking fault reducing the gap locally.

AI.tldr: 通过DFT计算研究了GaN中堆垛层错的能量学、原子和电子结构，发现wz相中I1层错最稳定，zb相中本征层错占主导，层错会形成II型界面并减小局部带隙。
AI.motivation: 研究GaN中堆垛层错的性质对于理解这种重要半导体材料的缺陷行为至关重要，特别是层错对电子结构的影响，这关系到器件的性能优化。
AI.method: 采用密度泛函理论(DFT)计算，分析六方纤锌矿(wz)和立方闪锌矿(zb)两种GaN相中的堆垛层错，包括形成能、原子结构、电子结构和能带密度。
AI.result: wz GaN中I1层错最稳定，与实验一致；zb GaN中本征层错占主导。层错附近价带顶局域在Ga极性侧，导带底在N极性侧，但zb相中趋势相反。所有层错都形成II型界面，会减小局部带隙。
AI.conclusion: 堆垛层错显著影响GaN的电子结构，形成II型界面并减小局部带隙，这些发现对于理解和控制GaN基器件的缺陷相关性能具有重要意义。

title: Computational Design of Ductile Additively Manufactured Tungsten-Based Refractory Alloys
summary: Tungsten exhibits exceptional temperature and radiation resistance, making it well-suited for applications in extreme environments such as nuclear fusion reactors. Additive manufacturing offers geometrical design freedom and rapid prototyping capabilities for these applications, provided the intrinsic brittleness and low printability of tungsten can be overcome. Designing tungsten alloys with improved ductility, and thus printability in additive manufacturing, can be accelerated using a computationally derived performance predictor to screen out brittle compositions. Calculations of the Pugh ratio using density functional theory may serve this purpose, given its correlation with ductility. This process can be made more efficient through the use of machine learning interatomic potentials to accelerate density functional theory calculations. Here, we demonstrate that machine learning interatomic potentials can effectively identify optimal alloy compositions in the W-Ta-Nb system along the melting point-Pugh ratio Pareto front. The trend in Pugh ratio as a function of tungsten fraction is explained in terms of the electronic density of states at the Fermi level. Experimental validation reveals a strong correlation between the computed Pugh ratio and the observed crack fractions in additively manufactured alloys. Notably, the two alloys predicted to have the highest Pugh ratio values, W20Ta70Nb10 and W30Ta60Nb10, exhibit no intergranular microcracking in experiments.

AI.tldr: 使用机器学习原子间势能加速DFT计算，通过Pugh比预测W-Ta-Nb合金体系的延展性，筛选出W20Ta70Nb10和W30Ta60Nb10两种无微裂纹的增材制造合金
AI.motivation: 钨具有优异的耐高温和抗辐射性能，适合核聚变反应堆等极端环境应用，但其固有的脆性和低可打印性限制了增材制造的应用。需要开发具有更好延展性的钨合金以提高增材制造性能
AI.method: 使用机器学习原子间势能加速密度泛函理论计算，计算W-Ta-Nb合金体系的Pugh比（延展性指标），识别熔点和Pugh比帕累托前沿上的最优合金成分。通过费米能级电子态密度解释Pugh比变化趋势
AI.result: 机器学习原子间势能有效识别了W-Ta-Nb体系的最优合金成分。计算Pugh比与增材制造合金中观察到的裂纹分数呈强相关性。预测具有最高Pugh比值的W20Ta70Nb10和W30Ta60Nb10两种合金在实验中未出现晶间微裂纹
AI.conclusion: 机器学习原子间势能结合DFT计算可有效加速钨合金延展性筛选，Pugh比可作为增材制造可打印性的可靠预测指标。该方法为极端环境应用的高性能钨合金设计提供了高效计算框架

title: Cavity-Mediated Radiative Energy Transfer Enables Stable, Low-Threshold Lasing in Hybrid Quantum Dot-Nanoplatelet Supraparticles
summary: Colloidal semiconductor nanocrystals are promising building blocks for optoelectronics due to their solution processability, spectral tunability, and ability to self-assemble into complex architectures. However, their use in lasing application remains limited by high working thresholds, rapid nonradiative losses from Auger recombination, and sensitivity to environmental conditions. Here, we report hybrid microscale supraparticles composed of core/shell CdSe/ZnS quantum dots (QDs) and CdSe/CdxZn1-xS nanoplatelets (NPLs), which overcome these limitations through efficient, cavity-mediated energy funneling and coupling. Broadband absorbing QDs rapidly transfer excitation to narrow emitting NPLs, enabling stable whispering gallery mode lasing with a low threshold of 0.35 mJ/cm2. These supraparticles retain optical performance after prolonged exposure to air, water, and continuous irradiation, offering practical advantages for optoelectronic devices and advanced pigment technologies. Ultimately, our approach provides a versatile, programmable platform for optical amplification and tunable emission control within colloidal photonic architectures. Keywords

AI.tldr: 该论文报道了一种由量子点和纳米片组成的混合微米级超颗粒，通过高效能量转移实现低阈值激光发射，并具有优异的环境稳定性。
AI.motivation: 胶体半导体纳米晶体在激光应用中面临高工作阈值、快速非辐射损耗（俄歇复合）和环境敏感性等限制，需要开发新的解决方案来克服这些挑战。
AI.method: 采用CdSe/ZnS量子点和CdSe/CdxZn1-xS纳米片构建混合微米级超颗粒，利用宽带吸收量子点向窄带发射纳米片的高效能量转移，结合微腔介导的能量汇聚和耦合机制。
AI.result: 实现了稳定的回音壁模式激光发射，阈值低至0.35 mJ/cm²，且在长时间暴露于空气、水和连续辐照后仍能保持光学性能。

title: Controlled epitaxy of room-temperature quantum emitters in gallium nitride
summary: The ability to generate quantum light at room temperature on a mature semiconductor platform opens up new possibilities for quantum technologies. Heteroepitaxial growth of gallium nitride on silicon substrates offers the opportunity to leverage existing expertise and wafer-scale manufacturing to integrate bright quantum emitters in this material within cavities, diodes, and photonic circuits. Until now, it has only been possible to grow GaN QEs at uncontrolled depths on sapphire substrates, which is disadvantageous for potential device architectures. Here, we report a method to produce GaN QEs by metal-organic vapor phase epitaxy at a controlled depth in the crystal through the application of silane treatment and subsequent growth of 3D islands. We demonstrate this process on highly technologically relevant silicon substrates, producing room-temperature QEs with a high Debye Waller factor and strongly anti-bunched emission.

AI.tldr: 开发了在硅衬底上可控深度生长GaN量子发射器的方法，实现了室温量子光源
AI.motivation: 现有GaN量子发射器只能在蓝宝石衬底上非可控深度生长，限制了其在器件架构中的应用。需要在成熟的半导体平台上实现室温量子光源，以利用现有制造技术集成到腔体、二极管和光子电路中。
AI.method: 采用金属有机气相外延技术，通过硅烷处理和后续3D岛状生长，在硅衬底上可控深度制备GaN量子发射器
AI.result: 成功在硅衬底上制备出室温工作的GaN量子发射器，具有高德拜-沃勒因子和强反聚束发射特性
AI.conclusion: 该方法实现了在成熟半导体平台上可控深度生长室温量子光源，为量子技术应用开辟了新途径

title: Growth of Large Crystals of Janus Phase RhSeCl Using Self-Selecting Vapour Growth
summary: In recent years, interest in 2D Janus materials has grown exponentially, particularly with regard to their applications in spintronics and optoelectronic devices. The defining feature of Janus materials is the ordered arrangement of different layer terminations - creating chemically distinct surfaces and an inherent out-of-plane polarity. Among the few known Janus materials, RhSeCl is particularly intriguing as a rare example of an intrinsic Janus compound. Owing to its exceptional chemical stability, RhSeCl offers a promising platform for exploring the physics related to the Janus-structure. However, synthesising large, high-quality crystals of this compound remains a significant challenge. Here, we report a novel synthetic pathway for growing crystals up to 6 mm in lateral size via a two-step self-selecting vapour growth reaction. We further present a comprehensive comparison of newly developed synthesis routes with all previously reported methods for RhSeCl. During these investigations, we identified a previously unreported impurity that forms in specific growth pathways and demonstrate how it can be avoided to obtain phase-pure few- and monolayer flakes. We showcase the reproducibility of the process to obtain high-quality, large single-crystals and flakes.

AI.tldr: 开发了RhSeCl Janus材料的新型两步自选择气相生长方法，可制备6mm大尺寸高质量单晶和相纯单层/少层薄片
AI.motivation: RhSeCl作为本征Janus材料在自旋电子学和光电器件中具有重要应用前景，但大尺寸高质量晶体的合成一直是重大挑战
AI.method: 采用两步自选择气相生长反应，开发了新型合成路径，并与所有已报道方法进行系统比较，识别并避免了特定生长路径中的杂质形成
AI.result: 成功生长出横向尺寸达6mm的大尺寸晶体，获得了高质量、大面积单晶和相纯的单层/少层薄片，展示了工艺的可重复性
AI.conclusion: 新型合成方法为RhSeCl Janus材料的大规模高质量制备提供了可行方案，有助于进一步探索Janus结构的物理特性

title: Raman scattering fingerprints of the charge density wave state in one-dimensional NbTe$_4$
summary: Charge-density waves (CDWs) are ordered quantum states of conduction electrons accompanied by periodic lattice distortions. Raman scattering (RS) spectroscopy is therefore well suited for probing CDW-induced structural modulations. We investigate the CDW state in quasi-one-dimensional NbTe$_4$ using RS spectroscopy. At $T$=5~K, the resonantly enhanced Raman spectrum exhibits 25 phonon modes. Polarization-dependent measurements reveal a strong coupling between phonon-mode symmetry and crystallographic symmetry, with modes polarized parallel or perpendicular to the crystallographic $c$-axis, along which the one-dimensional structure is elongated. Temperature-dependent RS measurements identify a transition between commensurate and incommensurate CDW phases, accompanied by pronounced thermal hysteresis, with transition temperatures of approximately 45~K upon cooling and 90~K upon warming. The hysteresis width depends on the warming rate, indicating a finite nucleation rate of CDW domains and suggesting potential relevance for memory-device applications.

AI.tldr: 通过拉曼光谱研究准一维NbTe₄中的电荷密度波态，发现25个声子模式，观察到共格与非共格CDW相变伴随热滞现象，具有存储器应用潜力。
AI.motivation: 电荷密度波（CDW）是伴随周期性晶格畸变的电子有序量子态，拉曼散射光谱适合探测CDW诱导的结构调制。研究准一维NbTe₄中的CDW态，了解其相变特性和潜在应用价值。
AI.method: 使用拉曼散射光谱技术研究NbTe₄的CDW态。在5K温度下测量共振增强的拉曼光谱，进行偏振依赖测量分析声子模式对称性与晶体对称性的耦合，并进行温度依赖测量研究相变行为。
AI.result: 在5K下观察到25个共振增强的声子模式。偏振测量显示声子模式对称性与晶体对称性强烈耦合，模式偏振平行或垂直于晶体c轴。温度测量发现共格与非共格CDW相变伴随显著热滞现象，冷却时转变温度约45K，加热时约90K。滞回宽度取决于加热速率，表明CDW畴的有限成核速率。
AI.conclusion: 拉曼光谱成功揭示了NbTe₄中CDW态的复杂相变行为，热滞现象和成核速率依赖特性表明该材料在存储器器件应用中具有潜在价值。

title: Unexpected Anisotropic Mn-Sb Anti-site Distribution and Van der Waals Epitaxy of MnSb2Te4
comment: 9 pages, 4 figures, 1 ToC figure, 16 pages of supplementary material
summary: Mn-Sb site mixing directly impacts both the magnetic and topological properties of MnSb2Te4. This study reveals, unlike previously believed, that these anti-sites can be unevenly distributed within the crystal. To that end, a polycrystalline sample was created with a two-step synthesis using MnTe and Sb2Te3 as precursors. DC-SQUID magnetometry was used to confirm its magnetic properties. In addition, the use of High-Resolution Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy combined with Energy-Dispersive X-ray Spectroscopy allowed us to identify the presence of an inversion-breaking asymmetry in the anti-site distribution. This reduced-symmetry structure bears resemblance to the recently proposed class of Janus materials and thus warrants further exploration due to its potential for combining topology and magnetism with other effects, such as non-linear optics and piezoelectricity. Finally, to further elucidate the interplay between site mixing, doping, topology, and magnetism, a method for growing MnSb2Te4 thin films over amorphous SiOx using Sb2Te3 seeds is introduced. The successful Van der Waals epitaxy of MnSb2Te4 over Sb2Te3 seeds using Pulsed Laser Deposition is confirmed using Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy. This represents a crucial step in incorporating these materials into a Si-based architecture, which offers the possibility of controlling the Fermi lever via gating.

AI.tldr: MnSb2Te4中Mn-Sb位点混合不均匀分布，形成类似Janus材料的不对称结构，影响磁性和拓扑性质；开发了在SiOx上使用Sb2Te3种子生长薄膜的方法。
AI.motivation: 研究MnSb2Te4中Mn-Sb位点混合对磁性和拓扑性质的影响，特别是先前未认识到的反位点不均匀分布现象，并探索其在硅基架构中集成的可能性。
AI.method: 采用两步合成法制备多晶样品；使用DC-SQUID磁强计测量磁性；结合高分辨率STEM和EDX分析反位点分布；开发了在SiOx上使用Sb2Te3种子通过PLD生长MnSb2Te4薄膜的方法。
AI.result: 发现Mn-Sb反位点不均匀分布，形成类似Janus材料的对称性破缺结构；成功实现了在SiOx上使用Sb2Te3种子的MnSb2Te4薄膜范德华外延生长。
AI.conclusion: MnSb2Te4中的反位点不均匀分布创造了新的材料平台，结合了拓扑、磁性、非线性光学和压电性；薄膜生长方法为硅基集成和栅极调控费米能级提供了关键步骤。

title: Thermalization of Optically Excited Fermi Systems: Electron-Electron Collisions in Solid Metals
summary: Ultrafast optical excitation of metals induces a non-equilibrium energy distribution in the electronic system, with a characteristic step-structure determined by Pauli blocking. On a femtosecond timescale, electron-electron scattering drives the electrons towards a hot Fermi distribution. In this work, we present a derivation of the full electron-electron Boltzmann collision integral within the random-k approximation. Building on this approach, we trace the temporal evolution of the electron energy distribution towards equilibrium, for an excited but strongly degenerate Fermi system. Furthermore, we examine to which extent the resulting dynamics can be captured by the numerically simpler relaxation time approach, applying a constant and an energy-dependent relaxation time derived from Fermi-liquid theory. We find a better agreement with the latter, while specific features caused by the balance of scattering and reoccupation can only be captured with a full collision integral.

AI.tldr: 该论文推导了电子-电子玻尔兹曼碰撞积分，追踪了强简并费米系统中电子能量分布向平衡态的演化，并比较了弛豫时间近似与完整碰撞积分的差异。
AI.motivation: 金属在超快光学激发下会产生非平衡电子能量分布，电子-电子散射在飞秒时间尺度上驱动电子向热费米分布演化。需要完整理解这一动力学过程，并评估简化模型（弛豫时间近似）的适用性。
AI.method: 在随机-k近似下推导完整的电子-电子玻尔兹曼碰撞积分，使用该方法追踪强简并费米系统中激发态电子能量分布的时间演化。同时应用费米液体理论中的常数和能量相关弛豫时间方法进行比较。
AI.result: 能量相关弛豫时间方法比常数弛豫时间方法更符合完整碰撞积分的结果，但散射和再占据平衡导致的特定特征只能通过完整碰撞积分捕捉。

title: An exciting approach to theoretical spectroscopy
summary: Theoretical spectroscopy, and more generally, electronic-structure theory, are powerful concepts for describing the complex many-body interactions in materials. They comprise a variety of methods that can capture all aspects, from ground-state properties to lattice excitations to different types of light-matter interaction, including time-resolved variants. Modern electronic-structure codes implement either a few or several of these methods. Among them, exciting is an all-electron full-potential package that has a very rich portfolio of all levels of theory, with a particular focus on excitations. It implements the linearized augmented planewave plus local orbital basis, which is known as the gold standard for solving the Kohn-Sham equations of density-functional theory. Based on this, it also offers benchmark-quality results for a wide range of excited-state methods. In this review, we provide a comprehensive overview of the features implemented in exciting in recent years, accompanied by short summaries on the state of the art of the underlying methodologies. They comprise density-functional theory and time-dependent density-functional theory, density-functional perturbation theory for phonons and electron-phonon coupling, many-body perturbation theory in terms of the $GW$ approach and the Bethe-Salpeter equation. Moreover, we capture resonant inelastic x-ray scattering, pump-probe spectroscopy as well as exciton-phonon coupling. Finally, we cover workflows and a view on data and machine learning. All aspects are demonstrated with examples for scientific relevant materials.

AI.tldr: exciting是一款全电子全势电子结构计算软件包，提供从基态到激发态、从DFT到TDDFT、GW/BSE等多种方法，特别专注于激发态计算，采用线性化缀加平面波基组，是解决Kohn-Sham方程的金标准。
AI.motivation: 理论光谱学和电子结构理论是描述材料中复杂多体相互作用的有力工具，但现代电子结构代码通常只实现部分方法。exciting软件包旨在提供一个全面的解决方案，涵盖从基态性质到激发态、晶格激发、光-物质相互作用等所有方面，特别专注于激发态计算。
AI.method: 采用线性化缀加平面波加局域轨道基组（LAPW+lo），这是解决Kohn-Sham方程的金标准。基于此实现密度泛函理论、含时密度泛函理论、密度泛函微扰理论（声子和电子-声子耦合）、多体微扰理论（GW方法和Bethe-Salpeter方程）、共振非弹性X射线散射、泵浦-探测光谱、激子-声子耦合等方法。
AI.result: exciting软件包提供了丰富的方法组合，能够处理从基态到激发态的各种计算需求，包括声子、电子-声子耦合、激子效应、时间分辨光谱等，为科学相关材料提供了基准质量的结果。
AI.conclusion: exciting是一个功能全面的电子结构计算软件包，特别在激发态计算方面具有优势，涵盖了现代理论光谱学的主要方法，并支持工作流程、数据和机器学习应用，为材料科学研究提供了强大的计算工具。

title: Halide diffusion in mixed-halide perovskites and heterojunctions
summary: Migration of halide defects guides ion transport in metal halide perovskites and controls the kinetics of halide mixing and phase separation. We study the diffusion of halide vacancies and interstitials in \ce{CsPb(I_{x}Br_{1-x})_{3}} and \ce{CsPbI_{3}}/\ce{CsPbBr_{3}} heterojunctions by molecular dynamics simulations using neural network potentials trained on density functional theory calculations. We observe enhanced diffusion of both vacancies and interstitials in the mixed halide compounds compared to the single halide ones, as well as a difference in mobility between Br and I ions in the mixed compound. Diffusion across heterojunctions is governed by the interface structure, where a Br-rich interface blocks migration of vacancies in particular, but an I-rich interface is permeable.

title: Predictive autoencoder-transformer model of Cu oxidation state from EELS and XAS spectra
summary: X-ray absorption spectroscopy (XAS) and electron energy-loss spectroscopy (EELS) produce detailed information about oxidation state, bonding, and coordination, making them essential for quantitative studies of redox and structure in functional materials. However, high-throughput quantitative analysis of these spectra, especially for mixed valence materials, remains challenging as diverse experimental conditions introduce noise, misalignment, broadening of the spectral features. We address this challenge by training a machine learning model consisting of an autoencoder to standardize the spectra and a transformer model to predict both Cu oxidation state and Bader charge directly from L-edge spectra. The model is trained on a large dataset of FEFF-simulated spectra and evaluates model performance on both simulated and experimental data. The results of the machine learning model exhibit highly accurate prediction across the domains of simulated and experimental XAS as well as experimental EELS. These advances enable future quantitative analysis of Cu redox processes under in situ and operando conditions.

AI.tldr: 开发基于自动编码器和Transformer的机器学习模型，用于从Cu L-edge光谱中直接预测氧化态和Bader电荷，实现模拟与实验XAS/EELS数据的高精度分析

AI.method: 训练包含自动编码器（用于光谱标准化）和Transformer模型（用于预测Cu氧化态和Bader电荷）的机器学习模型，使用FEFF模拟的大规模光谱数据集进行训练，并在模拟和实验数据上评估模型性能

AI.conclusion: 该进展为未来在in situ和operando条件下定量分析Cu氧化还原过程奠定了基础
